scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs = require('fs-extra'); const path = require('path'); fs.moveSync(path.resolve(__dirname, 'packages', 'common-files', '.npmignore'), path.resolve(__dirname, 'packages', 'common-files', '.gitignore'));" # Rename .npmignore in common-files back to original .gitignore as a workaround to somewhat weird npm install behaviour renaming the .gitignore.
